Test Name: Hereditary Erythrocytosis Focused Gene Panel (Next-Generation Sequencing)
Purpose: Detection of genetic variants associated with hereditary erythrocytosis.
Container: Labeled microcentrifuge tube (1.5 mL) containing purified DNA
Equipment: Fluorometric DNA quantifier (e.g., Qubit), fragmenter, thermal cycler, qPCR system, TapeStation or agarose gel apparatus, and an Illumina NGS platform
